Instruction: In a medium-sized stockpot over medium heat, combine 3 cups water, lentils, tomato, carrot, onion, garlic, and chicken bouillon, and simmer until the lentils and vegetables are tender, which will take approximately 20 to 25 minutes. After this, remove the stockpot from the heat and allow it to cool down to a lukewarm temperature.
Use an immersion blender to achieve a smooth consistency for the lentil and vegetable blend. Add a cup of water, cumin, sea salt, pepper, and coriander into the soup. Warm it over medium heat.
